item.title: By: Mazel CrypTOV
item.dc:creator: Mazel CrypTOV
item.description: Well-explained and very informative. Thanks for sharing this. Very useful for starters in the cryptocurrency world and for those who are new to blockchain technology.
item.content:encoded: Well-explained and very informative. Thanks for sharing this. Very useful for starters in the cryptocurrency world and for those who are new to blockchain technology.

item.title: By: Steven

item.description: Excellently explained. Blockchain technology is really important, I hope it gets global adoption.
item.content:encoded: Excellently explained. Blockchain technology is really important, I hope it gets global adoption.
